_metadata.description: Command triggers for puzzle-type room triggers

_documentation.description: Command triggers are activated by PUZZLE-type triggers in rooms. When a player executes a specific command (e.g., 'say komi', 'pull lever'), the game checks if the room has a PUZZLE trigger with a matching command trigger ID. If found, the player sees the player_message and others in the room see the room_message.

fields.trigger_id: Unique identifier for this command trigger (referenced by room trigger v2 field)
fields.command: The exact command that triggers this (e.g., 'say komi', 'pull lever')
fields.player_message: Message displayed to the player executing the command. {0} is replaced with player name.
fields.room_message: Message displayed to other players in the room. {0} is replaced with triggering player name.

usage.room_trigger_linkage: Room triggers with triggerType=PUZZLE reference these via the v2 field
usage.command_matching: Commands are matched case-insensitively with the exact phrase
usage.message_formatting: {0} placeholder is replaced with the triggering player's name
